thread.title: 8 Pairs Of Black Tights That You Have Been Looking For All Your Life
thread.title_full: 8 Pairs Of Black Tights That You Have Been Looking For All Your Life

title: 8 Pairs Of Black Tights That You Have Been Looking For All Your Life
text:
facebook 196 SHARES 
Black tights are holy. Most women (read all) cease to function in its absence. Nope, this is not an exaggeration. For all of us who decline to be seen in anything but tights, during our can’t-even wintry days, this is a reality. It takes exactly 15 seconds to slip into one (that’s one third of the time we spend getting our pants on). And, it can be paired with every separate ever made in the history of retail. Going to a party? Put a dress on it. Rushing to the office? Pair a sweatshirt, and you’re good. Date night? You need a nice stretch of them tights. It doesn’t matter where you’re headed; a loyal pair of black tights will keep you event-appropriate and, most importantly, warm. 
Look, they aren’t called our second skin for nothing. Our tights really do help us fight the chill while making us look fly AF. Also, can we all admit it’s refreshingly size-inclusive? 
Go ahead and snap up all (yes, all) from our handpicked selection of the season. 1.These “180 Denier Heatgen™ Brushed Thermal Opaque Tights” that had us at the heavyweight name.
